alert.note: Alert for St. Martin; St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 7:28AM CDT until April 02 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central St. Mary Parish in south central Louisiana... Southeastern St. Martin Parish in south central Louisiana... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 728 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bayou Vista, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Morgan City, Patterson, Berwick, Stephensville, Bayou Vista, Amelia, Patterson Memorial Airport and Bayou Geneve. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
